title: Quantified Conditional Logics are Fragments of HOL
abstract: A semantic embedding of (constant domain) quantified conditional logic in classical higher-order logic is presented.
histories: This work has been presented at the conference on Non-classical Modal and Predicate Logics 2011, Guangzhou (Canton), China, 5-9 December 2011
COMMENTS: This work has been presented at the conference on Non-classical Modal and Predicate Logics 2011, Guangzhou (Canton), China, 5-9 December 2011
